message.dimtr.nether_locked: Nether access blocked! Complete Phase 1 requirements first (Press J by default).
message.dimtr.end_locked: End access blocked! Complete Phase 2 requirements first (Press J by default).
message.dimtr.nether_locked_teleport: ACCESS DENIED! You have been teleported to spawn. Complete Phase 1 to access the Nether!
message.dimtr.end_locked_teleport: ACCESS DENIED! You have been teleported to spawn. Complete Phase 2 to access The End!
message.dimtr.phase1_unlocked_global: Phase 1 complete! The Nether is now accessible for all players.
message.dimtr.phase2_unlocked_global: Phase 2 complete! The End is now accessible for all players.
message.dimtr.phase1_unlocked_global_con: Phase 1 progression is disabled by server config. Nether access is open.
message.dimtr.phase2_unlocked_global_con: Phase 2 progression is disabled by server config. The End access is open (if Phase 1 is also complete/disabled).
gui.dimtr.progression_book.title: Progression Book
gui.dimtr.book.intro1: This book guides your journey through the dimensions, detailing the challenges to overcome.
gui.dimtr.book.intro2: Complete the objectives of each phase to unlock access to the next dimension.
gui.dimtr.book.page_turn_instructions: (Use Q and E to turn pages)
hud.dimtr.title: Dimensional Progression
hud.dimtr.tooltip.elder_guardian: Defeat an Elder Guardian in an Ocean Monument
hud.dimtr.tooltip.raid_won: Successfully defend a village against a raid
hud.dimtr.tooltip.trial_vault_adv: Earn the 'Under Lock and Key' advancement
hud.dimtr.tooltip.warden_killed: Survive and defeat the fearsome Warden
gui.dimtr.hud.window_instructions: Click tabs to navigate between windows
gui.dimtr.hud.page_instructions: Use Q/E to navigate between pages
gui.dimtr.hud.close_instructions: Press ESC or J to close
gui.dimtr.window.phase1_main.title: Phase 1 - Objectives
gui.dimtr.window.phase1_goals.title: Phase 1 - Goal Kills
gui.dimtr.window.phase2_main.title: Phase 2 - Objectives
gui.dimtr.window.phase2_goals.title: Phase 2 - Goal Kills
config.dimtr.server.enableMultipliers: Enable Mob Kill Multipliers After Phases
cmd.dimtr.phase1_complete: All Phase 1 requirements completed via command.
cmd.dimtr.phase2_complete: All Phase 2 requirements completed via command.
